Constructor Detail

GSBLService

public GSBLService(java.lang.String name)
Constructor for a GSBLService. Sets the service's name. String name The name of the service.

Method Detail

createWorkingDir

public boolean createWorkingDir(java.lang.String info)
Should be invoked via RPC by a GSBLClient to create the working directory on the server. Also store the client working directory and the client hostname in separate files.

Parameters:
info - a string of the following form: resourceID + "@--" + cwd + "@--" + hostname
Returns:
true if method completes successfully

deleteWorkingDir

public boolean deleteWorkingDir(java.lang.String myWorkingDir)
Called as a cleanup method after a successful run to delete the working directory and all of its contents.

Parameters:
myWorkingDir - passed as an argument in case myWorkingDir hasn't yet been initialized in this class
Returns:
true if the directory was successfully deleted

deleteDir

public static boolean deleteDir(java.io.File dir)
Method to recursively delete a directory tree.

Parameters:
dir - a File object representing the directory to delete.
Returns:
true if the deletion was successful, else false.

getJobEPR

public EndpointReferenceType getJobEPR(java.lang.String workingDir)
Reads the EPR of the associated GramJob from the working directory. File must be named "jobEPR.txt".

Parameters:
workingDir - passed as an argument in case myWorkingDir hasn't yet been initialized in this class
Returns:
the EPR for the job associated with this Grid service instance

getArguments

public java.lang.Object getArguments(java.lang.String workingDir)
Returns our argBean, read from disk.

setArguments

public void setArguments(java.lang.Object argBean,
                         java.lang.String myWorkingDir)
Serializes argBean and writes it to our working directory.

getWorkingDirBase

public java.lang.String getWorkingDirBase()
Returns the working directory base.

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Get the name of this service.

Returns:
the service name, e.g., "Ssearch34"

updateDBStatus

public static void updateDBStatus(java.lang.String status,
                                  java.lang.String workingDir,
                                  int update_interval,
                                  int update_max)
Update the status of a job. If a job reaches a finished state, update the finish time as well.

getJobList

public static java.lang.Object[] getJobList(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                            java.lang.String[] status,
                                            int timecounter)
Returns a list of jobs matching the status given. The objects in the array will be Strings.

getArgument

public java.lang.String getArgument(java.lang.String arg,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> perJobFiles,
                                    int index)
Return a bunch of arguments concatenated together as a string.

Parameters:
arg - the argument we're working with
perJobFiles - holds all the arguments
index - tells the position of arg in perJobFiles
Returns:
the comma-separated string
